span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 恶心的，晕船的： affected with nausea
【例】 the rolling of the ship made the young sailor squeamish 摇晃的船只让年轻的水手感到恶心
【近】 ill, nauseated, qualmish, queasy, queer, queerish, sick, sickish
【反】 healthy, well 状态良好的

【记】 scream 尖叫→易受惊
